title: Computer-Based Mathematics Test Design Applying Cognitive Load Theory

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical operations and statistical concepts, experience with CBT platforms
context.additional_context: Course focused on designing personalized CBT (Computer-Based Training) and mastering assessment methodologies using learners' mobile devices.

learning_goals: Learners can explain how to optimize visual components of CBT math items according to CTML principles.
Learners can redesign the information presentation structure of test items by applying Cognitive Load Theory (CLT).
Learners analyze eye-tracking data in mobile environments to evaluate item utility.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
